properties.address: Didcot Baptist Church, Didcot, Oxfordshire OX11 0BS
properties.description: Informal and relaxed space where a coffee and biscuit/cake is assured with a great team, a knitting group of lovely ladies, a dominoes games ever so often and a great space to get involved in any of the activities above or in getting creative by drawing, puzzles or just having a chat whilst making new friends.
properties.title: Coffee and Co

properties.description: All welcome to our public library. Accessible, centre of town location, bike rails, near bus stops and parking available for our visitors.
properties.title: Didcot Library

properties.address: The Didcot Wave, Didcot, Oxfordshire OX11 8NX
properties.description: Come along to our centre where we will offer a warm welcome, comfortable seating, the opportunity to charge a phone or device, use the free WiFi or even have tea or coffee.
properties.title: Didcot Wave

properties.description: We are open every Monday from 9am until 5pm serving a variety of hot meals, tea, coffee, squash and home made cakes. we just ask for a donation if you can afford it. We cater for children and have a small play area. We also have tables for people to bring laptops and connect the the WiFi.
properties.title: HEG community cafe

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 8th December 2023** The space is open to all - only on Friday 8th December
properties.title: Neighbourhood Kitchen Pop-up - Pilot / Taster Day 8th December 2023

properties.description: A warm and welcoming space open for everyone
properties.title: The Fountain Community Hub

properties.address: The Harwellian Club, Didcot, Oxfordshire OX11 0LG
properties.description: All are welcome at the Harwellcome community cafe. A warm, welcoming space with free tea, coffee and cakes/snacks provided. Once a week on Thursday afternoons.
properties.title: The Harwellcome Community Cafe

properties.address: Wallingford Baptist Church, Wallingford, Wallingford OX10 0BH
properties.description: Open every Monday 9:30am to 4pm. All are welcome to join us. Hot drinks available all day. There is a public car park next door
properties.title: The Living Room at Wallingford Baptist Church

properties.address: Wallingford Methodist Church, Wallingford, Oxfordshire OX10 0AS
properties.description: A warm welcoming space for all. Every Tuesday from 12 till 4pm. Tea,coffee, soup and cake. Free to all no need to book, just turn up.
properties.title: Walllingford Methodist church Hall “A place to be “
